Name: Timeout_CCS
Comment: Timeout  of  charger's  charging  state  message

Name: Timeout_CRO
Comment: Timeout of charger's charging preparation completion message

Name: Timeout_CSD
Comment: Timeout of charger's charging statistics message

Name: Timeout_CST
Comment: Timeout of charger's charging suspension message

Name: Timeout_CTS_CML
Comment: Timeout of charger time synchronization message and charger maximum output capacity message

Name: BmsReadyForCharging
Comment: Whether BMS is ready for charging

Name: SingleBatteryMaxTemperature
Comment: Maximum temperature of power storage battery (°C)

Name: SingleBatteryMaxVoltage
Comment: Maximum voltage of single power storage battery (V)

Name: SingleBatteryMinTemperature
Comment: Minimum temperature of power storage battery (°C)

Name: SingleBatteryMinVoltage
Comment: Minimum voltage of single power storage battery (V)

Name: BatteryChargingOvercurrent
Comment: Charging overcurrent of power storage battery

Name: BatteryExcessTemperature
Comment: Excess temperature of power storage battery

Name: BatteryHighestTemp
Comment: Highest temperature of power storage battery

Name: BatteryHighestTempSerNo
Comment: Serial number of the highest temperature detection point

Name: BatteryInsulationState
Comment: Insulation state of power storage battery

Name: BatteryLowestTemp
Comment: The lowest temperature of power storage battery

Name: BatteryLowestTempSerNo
Comment: Serial number of the lowest temperature detection point of power storage battery

Name: BatteryOutputConnectorState
Comment: Connection state of output connector of power storage battery set

Name: SingleBatteryHighestVoltageSerNo
Comment: Serial number of the highest voltage of single power storage battery

Name: StateOfCharge
Comment: State-of-charge SOC of power storage battery for complete vehicle

Name: BmsConnectorOverTemp
Comment: BMS component and output connector over-temperature

Name: ExcessiveCurrentError
Comment: Whether current exceeds the demand value

Name: RequiredSocTargetValue
Comment: Wether the required SOC target value reached

Name: SettingValueOfSingleVoltage
Comment: Wether the setting value of single voltage reached

Name: SettingValueOfTotalVoltage
Comment: Wether the setting value of total voltage reached

Name: VoltageDetectionFault
Comment: Voltage detection fault at check point 2

Name: Timeout_BCP
Comment: Timeout of battery charging parameter message

Name: Timeout_BCS
Comment: Timeout of overall battery charging state message

Name: Timeout_BRM
Comment: Timeout of BMS and vehicle recognition message

Name: Timeout_BRO
Comment: Timeout of BMS's charging preparation completion message

Name: Timeout_BSD
Comment: Timeout of BMS's charging statistics message

Name: Timeout_BSM
Comment: Timeout of battery charging requirement message

Name: Timeout_BST
Comment: Timeout of BMS's charging suspension message

Name: ChargerReadyForCharging
Comment: Whether charger is ready for charging

Name: CannotSupplyReqElQuantity
Comment: The required electric quantity cannot be transmitted

Name: ChargerIntPartOverTemp
Comment: Charger is over-temperature at the internal part

Name: ConditionReached
Comment: Charging suspends due to reaching the condition set by charger

Name: GroupNrOfCellWithHighestVoltage
Comment: Group number in which the highest voltage of single power storage battery is located

Name: HighestVoltageOfBatteryCell
Comment: Voltage of maximum single power storage battery
